name: Eclectic Medical Journal (IAPSOP)
content:
Eclectic Medical Journal (IAPSOP) About Archives Practices Contribute Contacts Search     Periodical: Eclectic Medical Journal Summary: From Pat Deveney's database: Eclectic Medical Journal. 1849 Monthly Cincinnati, OH. Publisher: Wm. White & Company. Editor: Joseph Rodes Buchanan. 1/1, January 1849 (which was 8/1 of the old series). 52 pp. Organ of the Eclectic Medical College of Cincinnati which had among its alumni Buchanan, John Ballou Newbrough, Caroline B. Winslow, Alice B. Stockham, John Uri Lloyd, and many other figures prominent in spiritualism, reform and mental healing. 1849 Eclectic Medical Journal 1850 Eclectic Medical Journal 1854 Eclectic Medical Journal 1856 Eclectic Medical Journal 1858 Eclectic Medical Journal
